+    def test_digamma(self):

+            6.90625419464,
+        ])

+        self.assertEqual(out, expected, 1e-5)
+

+        self.assertEqual(out, expected, 1e-5)
body: Leaving these here since I've compressed the values below into a `torch.logspace()` as you suggested. Also the values below span a wider range and require a lower precision (since `TestCase.assertEqual()` does not deal well with relative error).
